attributes.action: create a new offence of causing a death whilst driving a stolen car with a mandatory 8 year jail centence from age 16 upwards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lets have proper centences for idiots who steal cars to joyride in and cause the deaths of pedestrians and other drivers rather than the pathetic non punishments they currently get such as fines or further disqualifications which they ignore anyway
